message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay $20,000. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering its value to me.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value, however, I can't drop the price to $17,000.  Would you consider $18,500?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $18,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $18,000 for the product. Can you consider that?
